#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
map<int,int>mymap;
int main()
{
	char a[1000005];
	int i,j,k,l,n,m,t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		mymap.clear();
		for(i=65;i<=129;i++)
			mymap[i]=-1;
		scanf("%s",a);
		l=strlen(a);
		int lenn=0,maxx=0,prev=-1;
		for(i=0;i<l;i++)
		{
			if(mymap[int(a[i])]==-1)
			{
				lenn++;
				if(lenn>maxx)
					maxx=lenn;
				mymap[int(a[i])]=i;
			}
			else
			{
				if(mymap[int(a[i])]>prev)
					prev=mymap[int(a[i])];
				lenn=i-prev;
				mymap[int(a[i])]=i;
				if(lenn>maxx)
					maxx=lenn;
			}
			//cout<<mymap[a[i]]<<" "<<lenn<<endl;
		}
		cout<<maxx<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
